t = int(input())
for i in range(t):
    n = int(input())
    count = 0
    for i in range(n):
        (a, b) = map(int, input().split())
        p = max(a, b)
        q = min(a, b)
        r = p - q
        if r > 5:
            count = count + 1
    print(count)

a = int(input())
for i in range(a):
    k = int(input())
    l = []
    for j in range(k):
        (b, c) = map(int, input().split())
        v = abs(b - c)
        l.append(v)
    c = 0
    l1 = []
    for t in range(0, len(l)):
        if l[t] > 5:
            l1.append(l[t])
    print(len(l1))

T = int(input())
for t in range(0, T):
    N = int(input())
    S = []
    J = []
    count = 0
    for i in range(0, N):
        (s, j) = map(int, input().split())
        S.append(s)
        J.append(j)
        if j - s > 5:
            count += 1
    print(count)
